pullRequest.title: [RW-3212][Risk=no] Working workspace billing info
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description:
This adds a new endpoint to get workspace free tier billing info, and shows it on the workspace about page. It is restricted to writers and owners only.


PR checklist

 This PR meets the Acceptance Criteria in the JIRA story
 The JIRA story has been moved to Dev Review
 This PR includes appropriate unit tests
 I have run and tested this change locally
 If this includes an API change, I have updated the appropriate Swagger definitions and notified API consumers
 If this includes a new feature flag, I have created and linked new JIRA tickets to (a) turn on the feature flag and (b) remove it later

nodes.bodyText: nit: do we need single quotes?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -815,6 +815,21 @@ paths:
           description: Workspace deletion request accepted
           schema:
             "$ref": "#/definitions/EmptyResponse"
+  "/v1/workspaces/{workspaceNamespace}/{workspaceId}/billing-usage":
+    parameters:
+      - "$ref": "#/parameters/workspaceNamespace"
+      - "$ref": "#/parameters/workspaceId"
+    get:
+      tags:
+      - workspaces
+      description: 'Gets the free tier billing spend for a specified workspace'

nodes.bodyText: nit: I'd rename this to cost for consistency with our db
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -3750,6 +3765,16 @@ definitions:
       published:
         type: boolean
         default: false
+  WorkspaceBillingUsageResponse:
+    type: object
+    required:
+    - billingUsage
+    properties:
+      billingUsage:

nodes.bodyText: would we be able to extend this test case to verify the return value? I'm hoping its as simple as just saving a free tier row and asserting the return value from here.
